Dear Hagop,

 

Good afternoon. Thank you for your patience.

 

Please find policy documents attached for the Political Violence Policy.

 

We have checked the documents and found them to be in order. Please advise us if you notice any discrepancy with the agreed terms, please contact us to discuss further correction.

 

In respect to the JB policy, the insurer has requested for the trade license of Orient Beauty International FZCO which is the major shareholder of MICHEL CHALHOUB TRADING CO.L.L.C.

 

Note:  If the shareholder of our customer is a company, then it is mandatory to collect the TL copy and ownership details of that company.

 



 

 

Best Regards,

Hannah Gabo
